Service Consultant Guide

Tire Guide was a lengthy project targeting Service Consultants to give them a breakdown of what their tire program offered. The was sent out nation-wide to over 500 consultants. The content was Hyundai specific. The final piece was wire bound, with laminated tabs for each section. I organized all photo shoots or retouching with our in-house photographer. After it was sent out, it was such a successful document Hyundai asked us to create a PDF version to have digitally available.
